alert.note: Alert for Dickey; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 22 at 3:21PM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions in open country. Little to no additional snow accumulation expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Dickey, LaMoure, Logan, and McIntosh Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until Noon CST Wednesday. For the Blizzard Warning, until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Significant drifting may make some roads impassable.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
